external_games.name: Train Simulator: GWR Star Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: GWR Star Loco Add-On
summary: In the late 1890s the Great Western Railway were seeking new locomotives as part of their post-broad gauge conversion modernization. The newly appointed Chief Mechanical Engineer of the GWR, George Jackson Churchward, sought out designs for modern steam locomotives that could serve the Western network far into the future.
